pkgmetadata.longdescription: # DEPRECATED Python Protobuf implementation for TerraTerra Proto python library will not be maintained any further by TFL officialy. Alternative options to this library can be found here:- GoLang [Terra Core](https://github.com/terra-money/core) clients, - JavaScript [@terra-money/terra.proto](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@terra-money/terra.proto/),- Rust [terra-proto-rs](https://crates.io/crates/terra-proto-rs).
